Primavera Salad

Arugula, cherry tomato, shaved almonds, shallot vinaigrette
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="8" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Crab cakes

Spring onion, mashed potato & cayenne
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="8" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Sunflower Street Tacos

Jicama tortillas, southwestern sunflower seed filling, shredded cabbage, tomato, pickled onions, avocado, salsa fresca
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="11" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Shrimp Scampi

Jumbo shrimp sauteed in white wine, butter and garlic.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="11" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Vegetable Tempura

Variety of vegetables battered & deep-fried, served with two dips
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="12" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/loprd_carousel_column][loprd_carousel_column carousel_column_title="Main"][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Lobster Bolognese

Linguini, lobster tail, herbs in tomato & garlic broth
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="28" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Salmon Steak

Quinoa, roasted carrots, mustard lemon glaze
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="29" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Dry-Aged Rib-Eye

Grass-fed, with arugula salad, smashed potatoes
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="36" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Demi-poulet de Cornouailles

Portuguese spices rub, radicchio, lentil & aragula salad, goat cheese, whole grain mustard dressing.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="38" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/loprd_carousel_column][loprd_carousel_column carousel_column_title="Dessert"][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Lemon Meringue Pie

Limoncello blueberry coulis & candied lemon zest
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="8" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Southern Pecan Pie

Warm Buttery Caramel, Chocolate Syrup, and Vanilla Ice Cream
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="8" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Creole Bread Pudding

Served warm with toasted pecans, seasonal berries, and rye whiskey sauce
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="9" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Biscotti

Faretti Biscotti Famosi Liqueur di Italia paired with rich coffee covered in vanilla bean whipped cream
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="11" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator][vc_row_inner row_column_alignment_v="" row_columns_gap="double" row_rows_gap="single" row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Bananas Foster

A tableside flambé of bananas with Caribbean rum and cinnamon served over vanilla bean ice cream
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="auto"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="12" heading_container="h4" heading_type_bg_oneline="true" heading_typography="font-weight:300" heading_color="#7b7b7b"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/loprd_carousel_column][/loprd_carousel][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_advanced_h_offset="desktop:push-double" column_advanced_v_offset="desktop:push-double|tablet:push-double"][vc_single_image image_width="1000" image_ratio="3:4" image_external="https://source.unsplash.com/ImA5Vr2XS58/1000x1400"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row row_container_height_custom="50vh" row_background_color="#1a1a1a" row_background_image_effect="parallax parallax-v" row_background_image_external="https://source.unsplash.com/ynEieC-gZMA/2000x1300"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section section_padding="padding-bottom:triple|padding-side:none" section_container_width="limited"][vc_row row_column_alignment_h="center"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Contact" heading_container="h2" heading_typography="size-class:h1-alt" heading_color="transparent" heading_color_stroke="#1a1a1a"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_section_padding="padding-top:none|padding-bottom:none|padding-side:none" row_column_content_alignment_v="top" row_columns_gap="none" row_rows_gap="none" row_background_color="#ffffff"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_advanced_h_offset="desktop:pull-double" column_advanced_v_offset="desktop:push-double|tablet:push-double"][loprd_maps address="510 3rd Street, Brooklyn, NY" zoom="16" map_type="TERRAIN" height="480"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-side:double|padding-top:double|padding-bottom:double" width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
